title: RHOA Returns! RHOP Supersized Finale!! + No More J*x
itunes:title: RHOA Returns! RHOP Supersized Finale!! + No More J*x
itunes:subtitle: Danny discusses all the Bravo news-- J*x let go, Braunwyn comes out, and Erika/Tom in hot water! Then he recaps the premiere of Real Housewives of Atlanta, which featured lots of bubbie work, wedding planning, activism, and more! On The Real Housewives...
description:
Danny discusses all the Bravo news-- J*x let go, Braunwyn comes out, and Erika/Tom in hot water! Then he recaps the premiere of Real Housewives of Atlanta, which featured lots of bubbie work, wedding planning, activism, and more! On The Real Housewives of Potomac finale, Michael unravels with the news of a Juan engagement, and Karen does HSN.


RHOA Recap: 7:48ish

RHOP Recap: 27:08ish


PS Subscribe to Danny's holiday podcast, A Very Merry Iconic Podcast, wherever you get your pods!


*To support this pod & access bonus episodes, visit Patreon.com/EverythingIconic
